___name.description: The name of the managed cluster resource.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Properties of the managed cluster.

___dnsPrefix.description: DNS prefix specified when creating the managed cluster.

___enableRBAC.description: Whether to enable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control.

___linuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

___agentPoolProfiles.description: Properties of the agent pool. Currently only one agent pool can exist.

___kubernetesVersion.description: Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

___aadProfile.description: AADProfile specifies attributes for Azure Active Directory integration.

___servicePrincipalProfile.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

_88ManagedClusterAddonProfile.description: A Kubernetes add-on profile for a managed cluster.

___config.description: Key-value pairs for configuring an add-on.

___enabled.description: Whether the add-on is enabled or not.

___podCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign pod IPs when kubenet is used.

___networkPolicy.description: Network policy used for building Kubernetes network.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___serviceCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___dockerBridgeCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___dnsServiceIP.description: An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in serviceCidr.

___networkPlugin.description: Network plugin used for building Kubernetes network.

_88ContainerServiceSshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

$eref.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key data.

___keyData.description: Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___publicKeys.description: The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs. Only expect one key specified.

___enableRBAC.description: Whether to enable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control.

$eref.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

___adminUsername.description: The administrator username to use for Linux VMs.

___ssh.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___linuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

$eref.description: Profile for the container service agent pool.

___name.description: Unique name of the agent pool profile in the context of the subscription and resource group.

___vnetSubnetID.description: VNet SubnetID specifies the VNet's subnet identifier.

___count.description: Number of agents (VMs) to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

___osType.description: OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux.

___maxPods.description: Maximum number of pods that can run on a node.

___osDiskSizeGB.description: OS Disk Size in GB to be used to specify the disk size for every machine in this master/agent pool. If you specify 0, it will apply the default osDisk size according to the vmSize specified.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___agentPoolProfiles.description: Properties of the agent pool. Currently only one agent pool can exist.

___kubernetesVersion.description: Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

$eref.description: AADProfile specifies attributes for Azure Active Directory integration.

___tenantID.description: The AAD tenant ID to use for authentication. If not specified, will use the tenant of the deployment subscription.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___aadProfile.description: AADProfile specifies attributes for Azure Active Directory integration.

$eref.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

___clientId.description: The ID for the service principal.

___secret.description: The secret password associated with the service principal in plain text.
